about_the_game:
Richard La Ruina's incredible new book is exclusive to Steam!

Richard La Ruina went from 21-year old virgin, to one of the world’s celebrated Dating Coaches, and finally to happily married family man. In Soulmate Sequence he reveals the techniques beyond just Pick Up. From building friendship circles and a rich and rewarding social life, to finding and keeping “The One”, Soulmate Sequence gives you the blueprints for success.

Imagine supercharging your social and love life, so that you never feel lonely, always have something interesting to do with great people, and have an abundance of superb options for dating…all clamouring for your attention.

Sounds hard? It’s actually dead simple, and Soulmate Sequence will give you the exact steps to take, not vague concepts of “just be confident” and “just be yourself”.

Most readers will choose to apply this to their love lives, but many will find benefits in each area of their life, from work to relationships with family.

Tried and tested over 12 years, and with thousands of happy customers, and real life proof in the media, Soulmate Sequence’s techniques will change your life forever.

Inside you get:
  • PDF version.
  • Kindle version.
  • E-reader version.
  • MP3 Audiobook version.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Architecture only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
